DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : healthy male female ( nonchildbearing potential ) age 1855 body weight > 50kg BMI 1929.9 kg/m2 normal ECG record nonsmoker Exclusion criterion : high blood pressure ( 140/90 mmHg ) pulse outside range 45 90 bpm history breathe problem e.g . asthma low haemoglobin ( < 11 g/dL ) blood donation within 56 day study start take regular medication participation another trial within 4 month study start history drug alcohol abuse abnormal clinical laboratory test know allergy
